summary: A command‑line utility that loads a pre‑processed language‑modeling dataset and a corresponding KNN retrieval index, then evaluates how accurately the KNN mapping links data chunks to their nearest‑neighbor entries, reporting quality metrics for selected chunk identifiers.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to verify and monitor the performance of KNN‑based retrieval components used in large‑scale language model training pipelines, ensuring that the index and dataset are correctly aligned before model training or inference.
